title: Font Suggestions Please
content:
Font suggestions for a logo. Indian/Paisley themed for gift/craft store. I was sort of liking how a traditional font like Trajan looks with the organic flowy paisley stuff but not sure.

 [‹ Font Suggestions Please!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060114/http:/typophile.com/node/33468 "Go to previous forum topic") [modern alternatives to bodoni ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060114/http:/typophile.com/node/33473 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wyclef

comments.content:
Better might be something like Cochin or Bernhard Modern.

hhp
Wow. Sirenne is an awesome font. I love it.
